# utils-merge

Merges the properties from a source object into a destination object.

## Install

```text
$ npm install utils-merge
```

## Usage

```javascript
var a = { foo: 'bar' }
  , b = { bar: 'baz' };

merge(a, b);
// => { foo: 'bar', bar: 'baz' }
```

## Tests

```text
$ npm install
$ npm test
```
